body:
The FairTax is a nonpartisan, tax reform plan to replace many federal taxes, such as taxes on income, payroll and capital gains, with a progressive, national sales tax.

The FairTax legislation, HR 25 & S 13, will:

Grow the economy by billions of dollars - FairTax.org/Economy

Create jobs and restore the Made in America label – FairTax.org/Jobs

Provide monthly “prebate” payments to untax necessities and the poor - FairTax.org/Prebate

Lower tax rates for all income groups - FairTax.org/Rates

Save $430 billion in annual compliance costs - FairTax.org/Compliance

Lower home costs – FairTax.org/Homes

Raise equal revenue as the current system - FairTax.org/Revenue

AFFT and the undersigned, urge President Obama to join Americans from the right, left and center to support the FairTax.
title: Support the FairTax legislation to grow our economy and benefit all Americans – Americans For Fair Taxation
